io.github.georgiosgoniotakis.bluetoothwrapper.library.interfaces

Interface BTNotifiable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity

    public interface BTNotifiable
    This interface notifies the class which implements it about changes in the bluetooth adapter's state and about the bluetooth activity of the current device. It is used by the two BroadcastReceiver.
    Author:
    Georgios Goniotakis
    See Also:
    BTAdapterReceiver, BTDeviceReceiver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdapterStateChange(int adapterState)
      Returns a status code whenever a change in the adapter's state is occurred.
      void onDeviceStateChange(java.lang.String deviceState)
      Returns a status code, as a string, whenever a change in a connection with a device occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • onAdapterStateChange

        void onAdapterStateChange(int adapterState)
        Returns a status code whenever a change in the adapter's state is occurred.
        Parameters:
        adapterState - The status code of the BT adapter
        See Also:
        BTAdapterReceiver

      • onDeviceStateChange

        void onDeviceStateChange(java.lang.String deviceState)
        Returns a status code, as a string, whenever a change in a connection with a device occurs.
        Parameters:
        deviceState - The status code of the connection
